Element.name: lblInvalidLogin
Element.xpath: //p[contains(text(),'Your login attempt was unsuccessful, please try again')]

Element.name: lblWrongFormtUpld
Element.xpath: //p[contains(text(),'An error occurred on the previous page:')]

Element.name: txtWrngXLFormt
Element.xpath: //div[contains(text(),'The first seven columns must be Recipe Application')]

Element.name: lblMatchedLayers
Element.xpath: //tr/td[contains(text(),'* Layers in red have no matching features in settings')]

Element.name: lblDisrdRtcl
Element.xpath: //caption[contains(text(),'Please select desired reticle for more info:')]

Element.name: lblUploadMetrology
Element.xpath: //table[@class='datatable']/caption[contains(text(),'Upload Metrology Spreadsheet for Patterns on Reticle:')]
